question: I am wanting to get married- any duas?
answer:
QUESTION
I am 27 year old girl wanting to get married. my parents know about the person whom i wish to marry and have been speaking to them over the last year but nothing seems to happen are there any duas that i can read for this to happen quickly
ANSWER


Share:
Recite Durood abundantly and also recite ?Rabbanaa hab lanaa min azwaajinaa wa dhurriyyaatinaa qurrata a?ayunin wa-j-alnaa lil muttaqeena imaaman?.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
